channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous Play Area, 14th February
item.description:
This play area is in desperate need of TLC! The floor is covered in green moss, the AstroTurf is coming up and has big holes in it, which a child fell over today! There is vile graffiti over the children's climbing frames etc, and lots of it needs repairing. It used to be a lovely place to go and is now very run down and needs repairing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnes Cray Road, Barnes Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dis-guarded Needles, 14th February
item.description:

item.title: Hoarding and E-scooter interference with public right to use highway, 14th February
item.description:
Extensive hoarding installed for extended period (over 18 months) occupies approx. half the pavement. As a result, the pathway is is not wide enough for people with mobility aids, nor people with buggies In addition, E-scooters and bikes are regularly dumped on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Santley Street, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
